thread.section_title: White, Jacobs & Associates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White, Jacobs & Associates | whitejacobs.com
thread.title: Amy
thread.title_full: White, Jacobs & Associates reviewed by Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: I am so pleased with my results with WJ&A. Justin Elliott was my Specialist and he knocked it out of the park! My items in question were not only removed from my credit report in under a month, but my credit score increased 100 points!!! I was shocked when I looked at my reports this morning, expecting to see maybe a 20-30 point increase, and saw a 100 point increase and my score in the 800's!! If you are looking to repair your credit in order to purchase a home, car, etc., invest in WJ&A and ask for Justin Elliott.
